QuestionTxt: (I would like to get your opinion on several areas of important government activities.) As I read each one, please tell me if you would like to see the government do more, less, or do about the same amount as they have been on...controlling the activities of large companies?
SourceDoc: General Electric Quarterly Survey 69-01 - National sample
SampleDesc: National adult, including an oversample of 261 Black Americans (respondents who were identified as "Negro" by interviewers)
